t: Amazon still says no to drugs, and is booting marijuana businesses | The Seattle Times
s: September 27, 2022 - Amazon says its policy around drug paraphernalia is longstanding, but sellers say enforcement changed without warning, abruptly ending years of business.

t: Could Amazon start selling weed? The e-commerce giant announces new drug testing policy and supports critical federal legislation
s: June 10, 2021 - Amazon has announced it will no longer test most job applicants for marijuana use, save for employees who fall under regulations of the Department of Transportation like delivery drivers. Amazon is also supporting the MORE Act, which could radically change the national cannabis landscape.
